Reviews.Content: Good business hotel This Ikebukuro hotel is about 5 min walk from Exit 35 of Ikebukuro station. Surrounded by shops and eateries and very convenient. We booked a triple room for 2 adults and 2 children. The toilet and bathroom is small (as expected) but the room is clean and hotel staff can understand English. Willing to keep our baggage for a few days when we travel out of Tokyo. The lobby area has 2 free to use PCs with internet connection.
Reviews.Author: LizAwa
